# Preface {.unnumbered}

This book is a study project of Statistical Rethinking, second edition, by Richard McElreath [@elreath2020].

## Prerequisites {.unumbered}

:::{.callout-important}
To use the `rethinking` you must install it as advised by Richard McElreath
as described in [rethinking](https://github.com/rmcelreath/rethinking). You
need to pay attention when it is done, but it works fine. Make sure you verify
the installation with `example(stan_model, package = "rstan", run.dontrun = TRUE)`
as described in the guides.
:::
